name: Tron (Hebdogiciel)
overview: In the electronic ring of a powerful computer, fight against a killer robot, a cruel game of freesbee. One of the few TRON games that isn't a lightcycle\Worm\Snake game, created by Brun Hugues and published in both Hebdogiciel Hors Serie N°2, Hebdogiciel Software N°2.
